title: Citizen Axiom Mens Watch AU1060-51 Overview
description:
Citizen Eco-Drive Stainless Steel Axiom Mens Watch - AU1060-51A -http://www.abt.com/product/70832/Citizen-AU106051A.html

Axioms refined yet sleek design offers a day-to-night fashion options for the avid trendsetter. In stainless steel bracelet with a white dial and stainless steel accents and the intriguing feature of edge-to-edge glass.
Features:
• Movement: Eco-Drive J165
• Functions: 2-hand
• Band: Silver Tone Stainless Steel Bracelet Fold Over Clasp with Push Button
• Case Size: 40mm
• Case Material: Silver Tone Stainless Steel
• Crystal: Mineral Crystal
• Water-Resistance: WR30 - 98ft (30m)
